lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In April, GenCorp sucessfully thwarted a takeover by a partnership formed by AFG Industries Inc <AFG> and Wagner and Brown with a restructuring program that included the purchase of up to 54 pct, or 12.5 mln shares, of its common at 130 dlrs a share for a total of 1.6 billion dlrs

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Tilden said Gencorp expects to realize about 850 mln dlrs in after tax proceeds by the end of 1987 as a result of sale of several pieces of the nonbroadcast assets of the company, including general tire.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Under the agreement the companies said Continental will acquire General Tire, including its related domestic and foreign operations, and Gencorp will retain liability for the medical benefits of retired General Tire employees who retired on or before November 30, 1984.
